sources.title: I'll Name The Murderer
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: I'll Name The Murderer (1936) THRILLER
sources.description:
Stars: Ralph Forbes, Marion Shilling, Malcolm McGregor
 Director: Bernard B. Ray

 When a nightclub singer is murdered, a local gossip columnist begins his own investigation. Watch for a young Margaret Hamilton, The Wicked Witch from "Wizard of Oz."

sources.title: I'll Name the Murderer (1936) Comedy, Crime, Drama
sources.description:
When a nightclub singer is murdered, a local gossip columnist begins his own investigation.
 
Director: Raymond K. Johnson
Writers: Phil Dunham, Edwin K. O'Brien 
Genres: Comedy, Crime, Drama, Music, Mystery, Romance
